name: IronCleaner
short_description:
The purpose of the Iron Cleaner is to clean the old data from Google Chrome or other Chromium based browser. This should speed up the browser and reduce the RAM usage.

Experienced users know that, after a few months of using, the browser becomes very slow! That's why I made this program. Iron Cleaner cleans much more than history, cache and cookies... It cleans all files that are related to previous browsing sessions. So, when you start your browser there are no old files to pull data from, and here you can feel speed improvement. Your browser will behave like it has just been installed, but with all your settings and private data (bookmarks, passwords...).

Iron Cleaner requires .NET Framework 4.0: http://q.gs/4qHrm


Version 4.1
For Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8
summary: Clean and speed up Google Chrome or other Chromium based browser
